name: Get settings specification of the installed executor

out_ports.name: id
out_ports.hint: Settings ID (equal to the "Settings ID" parameter)

out_ports.name: built_in
out_ports.hint:
Will contain "true" if this executor is built-in â€” it is a Java-executor, available directly after starting JVM.
Will contain "false" for extended executors like Python, JavaScript, sub-chains etc.

controls.caption: Build settings tree
controls.name: buildTree
controls.description: If set (default behaviour), this function returns JSON with the tree of sub-settings, if any exist. If cleared, this function just returns this settings specification without JSON of the children.
